FuncDef: This command configures the sharing of the egress buffers allocated to a hybrid port among the access and network contexts. By default, it is split equally between network and access.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the access weight as an integer. Values-0 to 100. ParamDefault: Default- 50
Specifies the network weight as an integer. Values-0 to 100. ParamDefault: Default- 50
